title: 110_s1351
content: H-1B Visa Program Modernization Act of 2007 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase the annual H-1B nonimmigrant visa cap, with a 20 increase for the following year if the previous year's quota is reached. Revises H-1B provisions with respect to: (1) application fraud and misrepresentation, (2) employer penalties, (3) Department of Labor investigations. (4) Department of Labor and Department of Homeland Security (DHS) information sharing, (5) information provided to an H-1B nonimmigrant upon visa issuance, (6) employment advertising. And (7) prohibiting an employer of fewer than 50 employees in the United States from having more than 50 H-1B nonimmigrant employees.
